MailLink4in1_KeyWord.QueryString: SELECT CAST(0 AS BIT) AS Selected,SOCopy,MBLCopy,APCopy,ANCopy, ov.BLNO,ov.Description,ov.ContactMail,ov.OceanBookingID,ov.IsValid,ov.NO,ov.RefNO,ov.UpdateDate,ov.OperationType FROM OperationViewOECache ov WHERE ov.CompanyID IN ({0}) {1} Order By ov.CreateDate DESC

MailLink4in1_Contact.QueryString: SELECT CAST(0 AS BIT) AS Selected,SOCopy,MBLCopy,APCopy,ANCopy, ov.BLNO,ov.Description,ov.ContactMail,ov.OceanBookingID,ov.IsValid,ov.NO,ov.RefNO,ov.UpdateDate,ov.OperationType FROM OperationViewOECache ov WHERE ov.CompanyID IN ({0}) AND (ov.ContactMailDomain LIKE '%{1}%' OR ov.ContactMail Like '%{2}%') ORDER BY ov.CreateDate DESC

MailLink4in1_MessageRelation.QueryString: SELECT CAST(0 AS BIT) AS Selected,SOCopy,MBLCopy,APCopy,ANCopy, ov.BLNO,ov.Description,ov.ContactMail,ov.OceanBookingID,ov.IsValid,ov.NO,ov.RefNO,ov.UpdateDate,ov.OperationType FROM OperationViewOECache ov WHERE ov.CompanyID IN ({0}) AND ov.OceanBookingID IN ({1})

MailLink4in1_SubjectInNO.QueryString: SELECT CAST(0 AS BIT) AS Selected,SOCopy,MBLCopy,APCopy,ANCopy, ov.BLNO,ov.Description,ov.ContactMail,ov.OceanBookingID,ov.IsValid,ov.NO,ov.RefNO,ov.UpdateDate,ov.OperationType FROM OperationViewOECache ov WHERE ov.CompanyID IN ({0}) {1} Order by CreateDate DESC
